mapper.sql: SELECT email, name, phone, birth, gender, zip_code zipCode, address1, address2, address3, regdate ,card_type cardType, card_no cardNo, card_cvc cardCvc, card_valid_thru cardValidThru FROM MEMBER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (email, passwd, name, zip_code, address1, address2, address3, phone, birth, gender, deleted, regdate) VALUES (#{ email }, #{ passwd }, #{ name }, #{ zipCode }, #{ address1 }, #{ address2 }, #{ address3 }, #{ phone }, #{ birth }, #{ gender }, 'N', NOW())
mapper.select: WHERE email = #{email} AND passwd = #{passwd} AND deleted = 'N'
